channel.title: xbmc on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in xbmc on Silviu's Blog

item.title: XBMC and Windows 8 on older hardware
item.description: Just wanted to note that older hardware works well with the new Windows 8 consumer preview. Since I had to change the hdd in my xbmc mediacenter I decided to give Windows 8 a spin on real hardware (not just virtual). Hardware: Gigabyte GA-MA78GPM-DS2H motherboard (AMD 780G +SB700 chipset) AMD 4850e dual core energy efficient cpu 250Gb hdd (all media is stored on a NAS) 6Gb RAM When I moved to a Full HD tv I found that I have to move away from XP to windows 7 in order to get decent hardware acceleration out of my integrated graphics.
